name: Repulsor Enchant
active: Repulsor: Knocks back nearby enemies and slows them by 80% for 1 second (90 second cooldown).
tips: Repulsor EnchantKnock back nearby enemies and gain Movement SpeedRepulsor (Active): Knock back and stun nearby enemies after a delay.
If an enemy is knocked back, gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 second(s).

(40s Cooldown) 500


This enchant knocks back nearby enemies and grants a burst of movement speed, letting you create space or chase down targets in fight setups.
